oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Allman Brothers Band at the First American Music Center
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Allman Brothers Band; Metal photoplates; woodcuts;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the Allman Brothers Band with special guests Hot Tuna at the First American Center on July 4. Poster features a metal photoplate of a flag and woodcuts of an arrow and stars.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mike Frederick;
